Bond [i]({T}: Until end of turn, target nonbonded creature adds this creature’s base power and toughness to its own, gains the following ability, and becomes bonded. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Whenever this creature attacks, you may pay up to 2 life. This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each 1 life paid this way.
